channel.title: PJA/ Eclipse Help
channel.description:
Ok so im trying to work project annihilation----
I did everything he said to do with eclipse except for the last things when you apply and click run i get errors and I didnt even do anything to the server but when he does run he gets the server working...
For him it runs the server fine with eclipse but it says you have errors--- proceed? and i click proceed and then it says this where it should be running the server just fine [code]Apr 29, 2010 6:09:44 PM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Apr 29, 2010 6:09:45 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Apr 29, 2010 6:09:45 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Apr 29, 2010 6:09:45 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCSpawn init INFO: Loading NPC spawns... Apr 29, 2010 6:09:45 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Apr 29, 2010 6:09:45 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Apr 29, 2010 6:09:46 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready REMAINDER: Fix the 508+ objects dumped lul. Apr 29, 2010 6:09:46 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Apr 29, 2010 6:09:46 PM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Apr 29, 2010 6:09:46 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Apr 29, 2010 6:09:46 PM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/thoughtworks/xstream/XStream at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(BlockingExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/thoughtworks/xstream/XStream at org.hyperion.util.XStreamUtil.getXStream(XStreamUtil.java:18) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition.init(GameObjectDefinition.java:27) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$1.call(World.java:117) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) ... 8 more [/code]
HELP ME

item.title: PJA/ Eclipse Help
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

dude gles i did what u said to add in run and it didnt work

Read full topic

item.title: PJA/ Eclipse Help
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

…u need the dependencies or libraries, should be in a libs or deps folder can’t remember which import them into your project, sideclick them and hit “add to build path”

Read full topic

item.title: PJA/ Eclipse Help
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Ok so im trying to work project annihilation----

I did everything he said to do with eclipse except for the last things when you apply and click run i get errors and I didnt even do anything to the server but when he does run he gets the server working…

For him it runs the server fine with eclipse but it says you have errors— proceed? and i click proceed and then it says this where it should be running the server just fine

Apr 29, 2010 6:09:44 PM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Apr 29, 2010 6:09:45 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions...
